s.text: This one caught my eye, not only because of the ridiculous picture of him on the front, but also the numerous pages of incompetent work.
This one caught my eye, not only because of the ridiculous picture of him on the front, but also the numerous pages of incompetent work.
He is an amazing man, it is true, but he gets tired like the best of them do.
That fact holds true wherever we go.
It could be any one or combination of a number of things, including power, prestige, or even misplaced ethical values (values that he thought were right, even if they were, in fact, not).
